name: header-ui-jinja2
description: Gets the required HTML and CSS structure for UI DSL layouts.

output.code:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <title>{% block title %}{% endblock %}</title>
    <style>
        /* Essential structural CSS for UI DSL layouts */
        .column {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 10px;
        }
        .row {
            display: flex;
            gap: 20px;
        }
        /* Grid layout structure - essential for DSL grid layouts */
        .grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
            gap: 10px;
        }
        .grid-row {
            display: contents;
        }
        /* Note: Visual styling (colors, shadows, etc.) should be added by the template designer */
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    {% block content %}{% endblock %}
</body>
</html>

notes: This header provides essential structural CSS for the UI DSL layouts
The included CSS defines the core layout behavior (flex, grid)
Visual styling should be added by the template designer
The HTML structure includes Jinja2 template blocks
